definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and leave without a trace

pinyin: bu4 jian4 yi1 dian3 zong1 ying3

definition: see 作戰失蹤人員|作战失踪人员[zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2]

pinyin: zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2

definition: lit. come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and go without a trace
pinyin: lai2 wu2 ying3 , qu4 wu2 zong1

sentences.english: He turned round and went back again.
sentences.chinese: 他掉蹤降轉頭又回往了。

sentences.english: A W. P. A. or W. A. policy covers you against partial loss in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 水漬險在任何情形下都給保部門損失蹤險。

sentences.english: Countess is killed later, this knife is also missing.
sentences.chinese: 女伯爵被殺死以後，這把刀也不知所蹤。

sentences.english: Minimap moving, and movement of things like the quest tracker and durability frame.
sentences.chinese: 小輿圖移動，並且可以移動任務趕蹤，耐久小人。

sentences.english: Girl you caught me completely off guard.
sentences.chinese: 女孩，你讓我完全損失蹤了警語。

sentences.english: He tried his best to conceal traces so as to elude pursuers.
sentences.chinese: 他嘗試滅跡覆蓋蹤跡以甩掉逃蹤者。

sentences.english: You can also track the delivery status through professional express website.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以通過專業的網站蹤追運送行程。

sentences.english: Can come greatly in Ma Lin on the road that rainbow village assumes office, 3 younger brother do not know a footprint however.
sentences.chinese: 可就在馬麟大來彩虹村上任的路上，三弟卻不知所蹤。

sentences.english: An F. P. A. policy only covers you against total loss in the case of minor perils.
sentences.chinese: 安然險只有在發生較小危險時纔給保全數損失蹤險。

sentences.english: Righteousness goes before him and prepares the way for his steps.
sentences.chinese: 公義要行在他面前，叫他的腳蹤，成爲可走的路。

sentences.english: The wrong track is mixed feeling in film, 3 3 falling life.
sentences.chinese: 影片中錯蹤複雜的感情，三起三落的人生。

sentences.english: I will go without a murmur, And His footsteps follow still.
sentences.chinese: 無論何往，不出怨言，隨主腳蹤一路行。

sentences.english: I know that F. P. A insurance doesn't cover losses on consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 我知道安然險不包孕斲喪品的各種喪失蹤。

sentences.english: Where healing waters flow do thou my footsteps lead.
sentences.chinese: 求你引導我的腳蹤，邁向醫治的活泉。

sentences.english: Be now for ever taken from my sight.
sentences.chinese: 現饒暌估恆地消逝蹤在視線的絕頂。

sentences.english: the absence of women and minorities in the halls of power.
sentences.chinese: 女性和少數族裔在政治中根本難覓其蹤。

definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
